item.title: Git(Hub), Hugo and Academic
item.description: A quick tutorial on how I created my personal but work related website using Git(Hub), Hugo and Academic. So what did I do: I already had Git installed and you will need it too. Then install Hugo. There are several options but I used the Tarball method. Full details can be found here but here is a brief description. Chose install location e.g., /usr/local/bin, in your executable PATH.
